entry.title: LBLA Volume JL Gold Tweezer
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type: Tweezers
Price: 25.90

LBLA JL Tweezer is designed to have the similarities to both our Volume J and L+ tweezers. It has a very precise tip that perfectly grabs and spreads Volume lashes in a diameter of 0.06 - 0.10mm. Golden plated for a smooth, comfortable hold.  The recommended pickup for these tweezers is usually 2mm - 3mm in from the tip.

entry.title: LBLA Eyelash Extensions Towel - Set of 2
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type: Accesssories
Price: 15.00

LBLA specially designed lash towel is gentle and soft for your eyelash extensions. The non-woven structure doesn't pull or tug on lashes and keeps them in their best fluffy condition. Our cloth is twice as absorbing than other regular face towels and dries lashes instantly! 

A great retail item for a studio. Recommended for salon and in home use. Our Lash Cloth can also be used as a face wash cloth and face towel. 

Set of 2 cloths in our cute breathable kitten bag to keep your cloths in great condition and lint free.

Towel color - Black

entry.title: LBLA Break Up with Your Makeup - Makeup Remover Mitts
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type: Aftercare
Price: 12.00

REMOVES MAKEUP FAST: Package of 2 reusable makeup removing cloth finger mitts that wipe away makeup, dirt and oil in just seconds.

REUSABLE & MACHINE WASHABLE: These cloth mitts fit over your fingers to clean smaller, precision areas like the lash line and lips and are machine washable - throw in the wash to use again and again.

FREE OF CHEMICALS: Using only warm water or with Lashbox LA Bubble Wash. These ultra-soft, woven polyester-blend cloths get rid of tough makeup without leaving behind residue - just fresh, healthy soft, skin.

FOR BEST RESULTS: Completely soak cloth in water or Lashbox LA Bubble Wash and use circular motions on your face, being gentle around the eye area. Rinse and lay flat to dry.

entry.title: LBLA Fiber Prep
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type: Liquids
Price: 32.80

Our new Fiber Prep is an extra step you can take to improve lash extension attachment to the natural lash, and prepare fiber for receiving glue. Fiber prep takes care of any possible dust, oils, or residues on false lashes that may affect retention. It creates a perfect bond from the false lash to the natural lash surface. 

To use simply apply small amount of Fiber Prep with a micro swab onto the base of the lash extensions on the strip, then create your set as usual.  For use on false lashes only, NOT for use on natural lashes.  Do not saturate lashes on the trip with Fiber Prep.

These glasses offer a 200% of magnifying.

entry.title: LBLA Anti Allergy Gel
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type:
Price: 48.00

The LBLA Anti Allergy Gel absorbs and eliminates fumes by curing the adhesive.  The gel captures and locks fumes in the jar.  It refreshes the air and protects technicians from inhaling fumes.  It also protects clients from being exposed to allergens.

USAGE INFORMATION:
Open lid and place I near the glue tray

Leave it open during application

Use one jar per each lash station

This product does not guarantee no allergies to sensitive eyes or clients who has history of allergies. This product captures, locks, and minimizes the amount of fumes from the open glue drop. 

80ml 

It will last about 300 hours opened

Lash Royal Sable - this lash has a perfect blend of fibers! It is as soft as the Cashmere lash with the flexibility of Silk lash.

These lashes sit on a specially designed glue strip that makes the lashes easier to spread and to build fans.

These lashes come with our newly designed glue strip which is very thin which makes it easier to spread your Mega Volume fans and pull off the strip without closing your fan.

Royal Sable lash is made of non sticky fiber to build which makes it our easiest lash to fan.

150ml

entry.title: LBLA Fluff Guard
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type: Liquids
Price: 35.00

Refreshing eyelash extension cleanser keeps your lashes fluffy and clean at all times. Great way to clean your lashes after make-up and before professional lash application. This oil-free formula, absorbs oils and maintains fluffy volume for mega volume lashes. Perfect for everyday use at home or professionally. 

1.7 fl.oz/50ml

 

How To Use:

For in home use or on the go, spritz solution on your Unicorn Duo Brush or your Teal Bristle Wand and start at the base of the lashes and comb upwards to the tips of your lashes. No need to rinse or pat dry. 

For professional use, spritz solution on your Unicorn Cleansing Brush or with a micro-swab starting at the base of the lashes to the tips of the lashes. Pat dry with a lint free cloth.

How is Fluff Guard different from Lash Shampoo ?

Fluff guard is a specially formulated solution to clean lashes from oil, protein, or eyeshadow residue. It is not a make up remover. We recommend this solution to clean lashes of residue OR, if yours fans are not fluffy anymore due to cosmetics, use Fluff Guard around your eye area. This solution does NOT need to be rinsed or dried.

We recommend you use it before lash application to clean your lashes from proteins & oils the could prohibit your extensions from staying. It can remove small amounts of makeup ... but for complete makeup; we recommend Bubble Lash Shampoo.

Bubble Lash Shampoo is a complete lash AND eye make up remover. It’s a cleanser for skin around the eyes. It is in foam formula and needs to be rinsed and pat dry.

When these products are used in tandem, your retention will be all it can be!

Our glue trays are a helpful tool for Volume our technique. Each tray has a special divot to help control the perfect amount of glue used.  Our glue trays are the perfect tool used to create perfect fans. 

Easy to clean - Just soak in PURE ACETONE, and wash with soap and water to reuse.

entry.title: LBLA Volume J Biological Tip Tweezer
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type: Tweezers
Price: 70.00

Surgical grade tweezers from our Platinum Collection.  These tweezers are made of German Steel for more durability and the most precision for the thinnest lashes and volume techniques.  

These tweezers are hand polished for better, more textured grip, and manufactured to be of the highest quality. Because each tweezer is hand finished, each will be slightly unique.  The “Sweet Spot” on each tweezer will therefore be slightly different, and while they can be used to pick up fans from the tip, the recommended pickup for these tweezers is usually 4mm - 6mm in from the tip.

J biological tip is recommended for Mega Volume and Russian Volume, and for both placing and spreading fan on the lash tape, and the shimmying technique.

This item has limited inventory in order to ensure quality and consistency

entry.title: LBLA Superhero Adhesive (5ml)
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type: Adhesive
Price: 99.00

This SUPERHERO glue bonds lashes up to 8 weeks! Very thin consistency and rapid dry makes Volume Lashing so much easier. This glue has the best retention on the market and significantly helps to reduce time and amount of work with your touch-ups.

This adhesive works best in humidity between 25%-45%(Recommended 40%) and temperature 60-73 degrees. For humid climates or in the summer may require a professional dehumidifier. Recommended for dryer climates.

  • Drying time - 0.5-1 second
  • Retention - 8 weeks
  • Viscosity - very thin
  • Color - seamless black
  • Minimum fumes
  • Flexible structure

Available in 5ml bottle

Use with in 30 days after opening.

CAUTION !

Glue is recommended only for advance artists who isolate lashes perfectly and work very fast.  

For professional use only. Esthetician license required to use this adhesive.

Please choose wisely open adhesive can not be returned or refunded.

Shake vigorously for 1 min before each use.

Proper use instructions: 

 

  • DO NOT APPLY GLUE ON SKIN!  
  • Adhesive can not touch skin at any time. 
  • Product can be used only on completely closed eyes throughout application. 
  • Use under eye gel patches or medical foam tape to minimize fumes
  • Be mindful that lash extension adhesive fumes may cause an allergic reaction to certain people.
  • Client Information Consent Form is required before first lash extension application.  
  • Patch test is required before using this product.
  • Patch test should be performed for all new clients and every time different adhesive is used for application. (different adhesives has different % of ingredients.
  • Be mindful that It is possible to develop sensitivity to adhesive with time. 
  • Read instruction on the back of the label before using

This no-fuss long-lasting adhesive bonds instantly and stands up to even the most difficult conditions.

Its non-viscous consistency prevents fans from becoming saturated and is perfect for creating beautiful fluffy open Volume and Mega Volume fans.  Rapid dry reduces application times up to 30 minutes. entry.title: LBLA Glue Aid (15ml)
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type: Liquids
Price: 37.00

LAXBOLA GLUE AID is designed to help cure your every glue, during unfavorable conditions as well as humidity and temperature issue.

Have you ever experienced change of glue properties during application? If conditions in the room changes your glue properties will change as well. Glue aid will help your glue dry faster when humidity is too low or too high.  When you glue dries slower than usual, glue aid will speed it up.

When you are using slower drying glue, our glue aid will help your glue cure faster. If you like your glue but you need extra speed, glue aid will be a great product for you.

Pro tips:

  • Simply apply a small amount of glue aid on a micro swab and dab off the excess.
  • Touch the micro swab to the base of the false lashes along the tape strip, being careful not to saturate the lashes, and wait 1 minute. Then apply lashes as usual.
  • Let the solution completely dry for 1 minute before you start lashing. Reapply every 30-45 minutes when needed.
  • Glue Aid is not to be used on the skin and natural eyelashes.
  • Glue Aid can be reapplied every 30 to 45 minutes depending on your needs and room conditions.
